summary: A test module that provides a reusable suite of unit tests for automatic speech recognition (ASR) models equipped with adapter modules, covering model instantiation, forward propagation, loss computation, handling of multiple adapters, and pretrained configurations across various architectures such as Conformer and Squeezeformer with CTC and RNNT decoders.
business_intent: Validate and ensure the correct integration and functionality of adapter modules within ASR models to support robust, modular, and maintainable speech recognition systems.
